20101210190458.000|20101210190500.000|CCO|IF YOU WANT TO LOSE SLEEP I'M

20101210190503.429|20101210190504.857|CCO|AIRCRAFT LICENSED IN THE UNITED 
20101210190504.857|20101210190506.286|CCO|STATES.
20101210190506.286|20101210190507.714|CCO|THE FAA SAYS ABOUT 119,000 HAVE 
20101210190507.714|20101210190509.143|CCO|WHAT THEY CALL QUESTIONABLE 
20101210190509.143|20101210190510.571|CCO|REGISTRATION.
20101210190510.571|20101210190512.000|CCO|SO WHAT ARE THEY GOING TO DO?
20101210190512.000|20101210190514.000|CCO|THEY'RE GOING TO CANCEL 
20101210190514.000|20101210190516.000|CCO|EVERYBODY'S REGISTRATION ON A 
20101210190516.000|20101210190518.000|CCO|ROLLING BASIS, MAKE THEM REFILE 
20101210190518.000|20101210190520.000|CCO|AND RENEW REGISTRATIONS EVERY 
20101210190520.000|20101210190522.000|CCO|THREE YEARS UNTIL THEY HAVE A 
20101210190522.000|20101210190523.667|CCO|DATABASE UP TO DATE.
20101210190523.667|20101210190525.333|CCO|TWO AT THE TOP.
20101210190525.333|20101210190527.000|CCO|AN AEROSPACE GEEK AND COLLEAGUE

20101210190537.000|20101210190539.500|CCO|WHAT DOES THIS ALL MEAN?

20101210190640.750|20101210190642.000|CCO|THERE'S A LOT OF GOOD REASONS

20101210190644.000|20101210190646.000|CCO|TOUCH ON AIRPLANES.
20101210190646.000|20101210190648.000|CCO|WHEN THERE'S AN AIRWORTHINESS 
20101210190648.000|20101210190650.000|CCO|MATTER.
20101210190650.000|20101210190652.000|CCO|YOU WANT TO MAKE SURE WITH THE

20101210193522.667|20101210193524.333|CCO|46.8%.

20101210193527.667|20101210193529.333|CCO|ATTEND PUBLIC UNIVERSITIES IN 
20101210193529.333|20101210193531.000|CCO|2008.
